body: Could you try using ruby from rvm to see if that makes a difference ?

I used the ruby and gem that come with OS X and it worked fine without any errors. I'm guessing rvm will also work but I can try it if you want. I think the root cause might be the Homebrew library versions or something.

I tested with `rvm` and Ruby version 2.3.0 and I actually get the same error. Maybe it is an issue with Ruby 2.3.0?

Here's what I get using the `rvm` installation:

```
Fetching: grpc-1.0.0.gem (100%)
```

Previously, I've noticed that bundler seems to work the best in recognizing the OS X platform and getting a gem with the extensions already compiled, and there have been issues using plain 'gem install', on OS X, in grabbing on these these gems, see https://github.com/grpc/grpc/issues/7727. Have you been able to install via bundler?
